overview:
Internet Technologist, Investor, Business Developer, Entre/Intrapreneur, with 16+ years of International Experience.

• 5+ yrs Director/Shareholder | EmailingNetwork (ReworldMedia, Paris). • 4+ yrs Investor | i-VC (Tech, Real Estate & Equity Trading). • 15+ yrs Founder (now Shareholder) | Soluprom. • 10+ yrs Founder (now Shareholder) | SPS Hardware.

Extensive Experience doing Business in: • France. • Spain. • Italy. • Portugal. • UK. • USA. • Mexico. • Brazil. • Argentina. • Uruguay.

Specialties • Business Development, General Management, International Sales, Negotiation, Marketing, Cross-Functional Team Leadership, Entrepreneurship, Intrapreneurship.

• Investing: Equity Trading, Real Estate, Startups.

• Internet: Search, Social Media, Email Marketing, Mobile, Affiliate, Re-targeting, Lead Generation (Co-registration | CPL), Contextual, Viral, E-commerce, Publishing, Opt-in List Broking (CPM) & Management (Monetization), Performance (CPA), DB Qualification.
